text: Haldwani Legislative Assembly constituency is one of the seventy electoral Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly constituencies of Uttarakhand state in India. It includes ward no. 1 to 33 of Haldwani Nagar Nigam of Nainital District. Haldwani Legislative Assembly constituency is a part of Nainital-Udhamsingh Nagar (Lok Sabha constituency). ==Members of Legislative Assembly== Key {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 1977 | Dev Bahadur Singh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1980 | Akbar Ahmad | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1985 | Moti Ram | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1989 | Narayan Datt Tiwari | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1991 | Narayan Datt Tiwari | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 1993 | Tilak Raj Behar | Bharatiya Janata Party |- |style="background- color: " | | 1996 | Tilak Raj Behar | Bharatiya Janata Party |- | colspan=4 align=center|Major boundary changes |- |style="background-color: " | | 2002 | Indira Hridayesh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 2007 | Banshidhar Bhagat | Bharatiya Janata Party |- | colspan=4 align=center|Major boundary changes |- |style="background-color: " | | 2012 | Indira Hridayesh | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color: " | | 2017 | Indira Hridayesh | Indian National Congress |} ==References== * http://www.empoweringindia.org/new/searching.aspx?value=haldwani&type;=2 Category:Politics of Dehradun Category:Assembly constituencies of Uttarakhand Category:2002 establishments in India Category:Constituencies established in 2002
